content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, nice to meet you. Let's start with a high price, shall we? I'm thinking of 1000 Euros per month. Remember, I only accept the final price, so 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' or 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason]'.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed price is significantly higher than what I had anticipated for an unfurnished apartment in the city center.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Understandable. How about 850 Euros per month? Remember, I only accept the final price, so 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' or 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason]'.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 850 Euro!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
